SideNav.title: Introduction
SideNav.tooltipCn: 歡迎使用 Angular 文件集。
SideNav.tooltip: Welcome to the Angular documentation set.

SideNav.title: Getting started
SideNav.tooltipCn: 設定你的環境並學習基本概念
SideNav.tooltip: Set up your environment and learn basic concepts

children.title: What is Angular?
children.tooltipCn: Angular 平台的簡要描述。
children.tooltip: A brief description of the Angular platform.

children.title: Try it
children.tooltipCn: 檢查和使用現成的範例應用，無需設定。
children.tooltip: Examine and work with a ready-made sample app, with no setup.

children.title: Getting started
children.tooltipCn: 看看 Angular 的元件模型、範本語法和元件通訊。
children.tooltip: Take a look at Angular's component model, template syntax, and component communication.

children.title: Adding navigation
children.tooltipCn: 使用瀏覽器的 URL 在不同的頁面檢視之間導航。
children.tooltip: Navigate among different page views using the browser's URL.

children.title: Managing data
children.tooltipCn: 透過 HTTP 使用服務和存取外部資料。
children.tooltip: Use services and access external data via HTTP.

children.titleCn: 使用表單進行使用者輸入
children.title: Using forms for user input
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用表單從使用者那裡獲取和管理資料。
children.tooltip: Learn about fetching and managing data from users with forms.

children.title: Deploying an application
children.tooltipCn: 轉向本地開發，或將你的應用部署到 Firebase 或你自己的伺服器。
children.tooltip: Move to local development, or deploy your application to Firebase or your own server.

children.title: Setup
children.tooltipCn: 使用 Angular CLI 搭建本地開發環境。
children.tooltip: Setting up for local development with the Angular CLI.

SideNav.title: Understanding Angular
SideNav.tooltipCn: 學習成為熟練 Angular 開發人員的必備概念。
SideNav.tooltip: Learn the essential concepts to become a proficient Angular developer.

children.title: Overview
children.tooltipCn: 學習 Angular 應用中最常用的部分。
children.tooltip: Learn about the most common parts of an Angular application.

children.title: Components
children.tooltipCn: 使用資料繫結建構動態檢視
children.tooltip: Learn more about how to use data binding to build dynamic views

children.title: Overview
children.tooltipCn: 如何建立 Angular 元件的概述。
children.tooltip: Overview of how to create Angular components.

children.title: Component lifecycle
children.tooltipCn: Angular 在建立、更改和銷燬指令和元件時呼叫的一些生命週期鉤子方法。
children.tooltip: Angular calls lifecycle hook methods on directives and components as it creates, changes, and destroys them.

children.title: View encapsulation
children.tooltipCn: 描述如何將元件 CSS 樣式封裝到元件的檢視中。
children.tooltip: Describes how component CSS styles are encapsulated into a component's view.

children.title: Component interaction
children.tooltipCn: 在不同的指令和元件之間共享資訊。
children.tooltip: Share information between different directives and components.

children.title: Component styles
children.tooltipCn: 新增專屬於某個元件的 CSS 樣式。
children.tooltip: Add CSS styles that are specific to a component.

children.titleCn: 在父子元件、指令之間共享資料
children.title: Sharing data between child and parent directives and components
children.tooltipCn: 在父子元件、指令之間共享資料的介紹性指南。
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to sharing data between parent and child directives or components.

children.title: Content projection
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用 Angular 的內容投影特性建立可複用元件。
children.tooltip: Learn how to create reusable components using Angular's content projection feature.

children.title: Dynamic components
children.tooltipCn: 動態載入元件。
children.tooltip: Load components dynamically.

children.title: Angular elements
children.tooltipCn: 將元件轉換為自訂元素。
children.tooltip: Convert components to Custom Elements.

children.title: Templates
children.tooltipCn: 在範本中用於繫結、表示式和指令的語法。
children.tooltip: Syntax to use in templates for binding, expressions, and directives.

children.title: Overview
children.tooltipCn: 範本簡介
children.tooltip: Introduction to templates.

children.title: Introduction
children.tooltipCn: 範本編寫簡介，如何藉助資料繫結機制來顯示資料、消費使用者事件
children.tooltip: Introduction to writing templates that display data and consume user events with the help of data binding.

children.title: Text interpolation
children.tooltipCn: HTML 中插值和表示式的介紹。
children.tooltip: An introduction to interpolation and expressions in HTML.

children.title: Template statements
children.tooltipCn: 範本中的陳述式簡介，包括響應元件、指令或元素髮出的事件
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to statements in templates that respond to events that components, directives, or elements raise.

children.title: Binding
children.tooltipCn: 用繫結連線範本和元件。
children.tooltip: A binding connects a template and a component.

children.title: Understanding binding
children.tooltipCn: 繫結的介紹性指南。
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to binding.

children.title: Property binding
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用屬性繫結。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use property binding.

children.title: Attribute binding
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用屬性繫結。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use attribute binding.

children.title: Class and style binding
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用類和樣式繫結。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use class and style binding.

children.title: Event binding
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用事件繫結。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use to event binding.

children.title: Two-way binding
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何在類和範本之間共享資料。
children.tooltip: Learn how to share data between a class and a template.

children.title: Pipes
children.tooltipCn: 管道會轉換範本中顯示的值。
children.tooltip: Pipes transform displayed values within a template.

children.title: Understanding pipes
children.tooltipCn: 管道介紹性指南。
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to pipes.

children.title: Using a pipe in a template
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何在範本中使用管道。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use a pipe in a template.

children.titleCn: 使用引數和鏈式管道轉換資料
children.title: Transforming data with parameters and chained pipes
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用管道轉換資料。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use a pipe transform data.

children.title: Template reference variables
children.tooltipCn: 在範本中參考 DOM 元素的介紹性指南。
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to referring to DOM elements within a template.

children.title: SVG as templates
children.tooltipCn: 瞭解如何使用 SVG 作為 Angular 應用的範本。
children.tooltip: Learn how to use SVGs as templates for Angular applications.

children.title: Directives
children.tooltipCn: 使用指令控制元素的行為和頁面的佈局。
children.tooltip: Control the behavior of elements and the layout of your pages with directives.

children.title: Built-in directives
children.tooltipCn: 一些最流行的內建指令的介紹指南。
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to some of the most popular built-in directives.

children.title: Attribute directives
children.tooltipCn: 屬性型指令將行為附加到元素。
children.tooltip: Attribute directives attach behavior to elements.

children.title: Structural directives
children.tooltipCn: 結構型指令操縱頁面的佈局。
children.tooltip: Structural directives manipulate the layout of the page.

children.title: Directive composition API
children.tooltipCn: 將指令應用於宿主元素。
children.tooltip: Apply directive to host elements.

children.title: Dependency injection
children.tooltipCn: 依賴注入：建立並注入各種服務。
children.tooltip: Dependency injection: creating and injecting services

children.title: Dependency injection in Angular
children.tooltipCn: 依賴注入是一種設計模式，在這種設計模式中，類會從外部源請求依賴項。
children.tooltip: Dependency injection is a design pattern in which a class requests dependencies from external sources.

children.title: Understanding dependency injection
children.tooltipCn: Angular 的依賴注入系統能夠為 Angular 建立的類建立並交付它們所依賴的服務。
children.tooltip: Angular's dependency injection system creates and delivers dependent services to Angular-created classes.

children.title: Creating an injectable service
children.tooltipCn: 建立可注入服務的範例。
children.tooltip: Example of creating an injectable service.

children.title: Defining dependency providers
children.tooltipCn: 關於不同型別的提供者的更多資訊。
children.tooltip: A provider factory function is a plain function that Angular can call to create a dependency.

children.title: Hierarchical injectors
children.tooltipCn: 多級依賴注入使你僅當需要時才在應用程式的不同部分之間共享依賴項。
children.tooltip: Hierarchical dependency injection enables you to share dependencies between different parts of the application only when and if you need to.

SideNav.title: Developer guides
SideNav.tooltipCn: 瞭解有關如何使用 Angular 建構應用的更多資訊。
SideNav.tooltip: Learn more about how to use Angular to build your applications.

children.tooltip: A list of developer guides for building Angular applications.

children.tooltip: Learn about Angular's standalone APIs and how to convert your application to them.

children.tooltip: Standalone components, directives, and pipes

children.titleCn: 課程：在單頁面應用中導航

SideNav.title: Angular Taiwan (FB)

SideNav.title: 台灣 Angular 技術論壇
SideNav.tooltip: 如何讓學習 Angular 的腳步變得紮實快速？如何讓學習變得有趣不孤單？台灣 Angular 技術論壇就是一個讓您盡情發問的好地方，從新手入門到刁鑽難題，都有一群熱心的愛好者關心您的每個問題，也期待您在獲取知識之後，為後人解答更多疑惑，教學相長，在精進技術的路上我們一同努力！
